attributes.action: Help For Zero Hours Workers Having Little or No Income During The Current Crisis
attributes.additional_details: The Government were more that happy to encourage employers and workers to sign up to Zero Hours Contracts, and now in the current  crisis the workers are left in financial difficulties through no fault of there own..
attributes.background: Pay All Zero Hours workers an Income Support Benefit equal to working 16 hours per week based on thr UK Minimum Adult Wage
